title: Close to perfection
review: As a horror fan, I expected a lot of what I've seen on this movie. But this is much more than just horror. It is about the power of friendship, love, brotherhood. It is about getting over beliefs and fears. It has everything that a movie should have I would recommend watching it even if you are not a horror fan DO NOT miss IT

title: So realistic and heart breaking
review: Not a single boring scene. This film is a little gem. Great writing and acting. Highly recommended.
